## Models comparison {.tabset}

 * Technology classes: climate change mitigation technologies, energy, solar, wind
 * Y: Levels, Logs+1, IHS, Max normalization by technology
 * Controls: gdp, pop
 * Auto-regressive term = 1
 * IIS=ON
 * **TREND BREAK (TIS) =ON**
 * p-val = 0.001, 0.01
 * Sample: top 25 patenting countries (by mean)
 * Time series: 2000-2019

```{r model, echo=FALSE, results = 'asis', fig.height=40, fig.width=60, cache = FALSE}

res %>%
       dplyr::group_split(tech) %>%
       purrr::iwalk(.,~{
         name <- unique(.x$tech)
         cat('### ', name, '{.tabset}   \n')
              for(p in unique(.x$dep)){
                   cat('#### ', p, '{.tabset}   \n')
                for(sm in unique(.x$p_val)){
                   cat('##### ', sm, '{.tabset}   \n')
                   filter(.x, p_val == sm & dep == p) %>% gen_p(., auto = TRUE)
                cat('\n')
                cat('\n')
                }
           cat('\n')
           cat('\n')
           }
         cat('\n')
         cat('\n')
       })
       
```
